thread.title: Jennifer Garner became ‘suspicious of nanny affair with Ben Affleck on holiday in the Bahamas’ | The
thread.title_full: Jennifer Garner became ‘suspicious of nanny affair with Ben Affleck on holiday in the Bahamas’ | The Advertiser

author: Emily Smith
title: Jennifer Garner became ‘suspicious of nanny affair with Ben Affleck on holiday in the Bahamas’ | The
text:
RUMOURS about Ben Affleck’s alleged affair with his kids’ nanny Christine Ouzounian continue to rage despite his strong denials.
The New York Post reports that sources confirmed that Ms Ouzounian was with Affleck and Jennifer Garner in the Bahamas when they announced their divorce on June 30.
Happier times ... Jennifer Garner and actor-director Ben Affleck in 2013. Picture: Getty Source: Getty Images
Ms Ouzounian began working with Affleck and Garner’s three kids while he and Garner were separated, and Garner only became suspicious of Ms Ouzounian while on the trip to the Bahamas.
The nanny was also photographed with Affleck outside his house on July 17.
A rep for Affleck, who is with his family in Georgia, where Garner is filming, reiterated his denial: “The story is complete garbage and full of lies.”
All smiles ... Christine Ouzounian leaves her house in LA. Picture: Splash Source: Supplied
On Wednesday, a smiling Ms Ouzounian, who’s hired a crisis PR consultant, put on a show for the cameras by leaving home in tight-fitting jeans and a groomed hairdo.
But she was upstaged by Garner, who took a break from filming in Atlanta to visit kids in a local paediatric cancer ward.
Jennifer Garner visits sick kids (Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/5yH6MFSocb/embed .)
Originally published as Garner ‘suss’ of nanny on trip
